amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to decrease the amount appropriated to the National Institutes of Health's Office of the Director by $3,748,715 to redress the amount of federal funds the NIH awarded EcoHealth Alliance, Inc. to conduct gain-of-function research at the Wuhan Institute of Virology.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pfluger amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pfluger amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pfluger amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
